translations: v.<正式>容忍，允许（尤指不同意见或反对意见）

sentences.sentence: The Bow Brook forms the western boundary of the wood.
sentences.translation: 鲍溪成了树林的西边界。

sentences.sentence: Brother, I pray you, do not drink of this brook; you will be changed into a wolf, and devour me.
sentences.translation: 哥哥，我求求你，不要喝这个小溪的水；你会变成一头狼，然后把我吞掉。
